purpose: Facilitates complex thought mapping and knowledge organization using AI-enhanced graph structures
principle: Utilizes fractal and rhizomatic graph structures to create interconnected maps of thoughts, notes, and code
reusability: Offers an API for integration into other systems and supports custom extensions for data input
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited documentation; primarily supports JavaScript environments
name: Neurite
description: Fractal Graph-of-Thought. Rhizomatic Mind-Mapping for Ai-Agents, Web-Links, Notes, and Code.
highlight: Combines fractal graph structures with AI for advanced mind-mapping and knowledge management
